title: Married Couple Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Married Couple Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Married Couple Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 190
items.arabic: ((بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ، وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ)).
